laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Fecal test for C. difficile toxin A & B
laboratory_examinations.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA. (Reference Range-Negative).
Marked inflammatory stranding centered around the pancreas consistent with previously documented pancreatitis. Increased inflammatory changes since the previous study.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Degree of inflammatory changes appears to have increased since previous study.
